title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI tool that lets you run large language models locally with a simple API and Docker-like model management.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, providing idiomatic access to the Ollama API for running and chatting with local LLMs.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama, installable via npm, enabling browser and Node.js integration with local models.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration for Ollama, allowing LangChain applications to use Ollama-hosted models as LLM backends.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama, offering ChatGPT-like interface, model management, and multi-user support via Docker.

title: ollama4j
summary: Unofficial Java client library for Ollama, published to Maven Central, enabling JVM apps to integrate local LLMs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama, providing a simple interface to run and chat with local models in Ruby apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with enhanced prompts, conversation history, and plugin support.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into the editor as AI coding copilots with inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes clusters with GPU support and autoscaling.

title: ollama-chatbot
summary: Minimal React chatbot example that connects to a local Ollama instance via the JS client, demonstrating streaming responses.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models through slash commands, supporting multiple concurrent threads.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that wraps Ollama for CI/CD pipelines, enabling reproducible LLM-based testing and code review steps.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot integration for Ollama, allowing teams to query local LLMs directly from Slack channels with rate-limiting.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration for Ollama, exposing local models as Haystack generators and embedders for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n
summary: Official n8n node for Ollama, enabling no-code workflows that leverage local LLMs for tasks like summarization and translation.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit component that embeds an Ollama chat interface into data apps with session state and file upload support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate for Ollama, offering async bindings and typed request/response models for local LLM inference.

title: ollama-go
summary: Community Go client for Ollama, published as a Go module, providing streaming chat and model management APIs.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Unofficial C# .NET SDK for Ollama, distributed via NuGet, supporting both synchronous and asynchronous chat operations.
